headline: Assessing Carrier Global (CARR) Valuation After Recent Share Moves And Mixed Performance Metrics
summary: Carrier Global overview after recent share performance Carrier Global (CARR) has drawn fresh attention after recent share moves, with the stock last closing at US$63.53. That price now sits alongside a value score of 1 and an intrinsic discount of 2.7%. See our latest analysis for Carrier Global.
